message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know you value money, so I'm offering you a good chunk.
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  My offer is more than fair considering the inflation we face.
Bob, time is money! This offer is as good as the last one, but every round costs us. Let's close the deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. The longer this goes on, the less we both get.
